participant_1.background:
I play the guitar and sing as a way to relax and express myself.
I'm not married, but I have been playing video games with my kids since they were little.
i am entering the police academy this summer.
i love to recycle.
and also love drawing.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy reading my favorite book, Anne of Green Gables, on the weekend.
i have two children under ten.
i like toyota cars.
i like early 2000s indie music.
I spend a lot of time reading and researching weird and wonderful things.

content.text: Hi, how is your day?
Great! How is your day going?
It is going well. What are your interests?
I love reading, drawing, and learning about weird and wonderful things.
That is great! I like to play the guitar and sing. I also love recycling and playing video games with my kids.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I do not have any kids, but I do have two cats.
Aw, cats are great! I love animals. What kind of cats do you have?
I have a tabby cat and a calico cat.
Those are both beautiful breeds of cats!
Thank you! What are some of your favorite songs from the early 2000s?
I love the song "Hey Ya" by Outkast. It is a great song to dance to!
I love that song too! I also love "The Good Life" by Weezer.
That is a great song! I also love "The Middle" by Jimmy Eat World.
Those are all great songs! I love to listen to music when I am working or studying.
Me too! Music can make any task more enjoyable.
I agree! I am glad we have similar interests.
Me too! I am enjoying talking to you.
Me too! I hope we can talk again soon.
Definitely! Have a great day!
You too!
